elements.title: Russian separatists release 2 U.S. veterans as part of a prisoner exchange (NPR Ukraine Recap)
elements.contents: September 21, 2022 • Two U.S. military veterans who disappeared three months ago while fighting Russia with Ukrainian forces were among 10 prisoners released by Russian-backed separatists as part of a prisoner exchange.
